desc: Powers weakened after cryosleep; first activation after sleep rolls –2 to Stat modifier for activation until trained/adjusted (1–2 scenes).
name: Stasis Degradation

name: Stasis Degradation

name: Stasis Degradation

desc: Neural link to the Ark can be hijacked; failed TN 12 Mental roll may allow rogue code or AI to manipulate the Synthral.
name: System Vulnerability

desc: Exposure to Ark anomalies or magic causes –1 to Mental rolls and occasional confusion (DM discretion).
name: Cognitive Drift

desc: Exposure to Ark anomalies or magic causes –1 to Mental rolls and occasional confusion (DM discretion).
name: Cognitive Drift

desc: Exposure to Ark anomalies or magic causes –1 to Mental rolls and occasional confusion (DM discretion).
name: Cognitive Drift

desc: Exposure to Ark anomalies or magic causes –1 to Mental rolls and occasional confusion (DM discretion).
name: Cognitive Drift

desc: (Psion only) Precognition may leave character distracted; –1 to Physical and Dex rolls during or immediately after visions. Roll Men:TN10 during stress to trigger.
name: Temporal Dislocation

desc: (Psion only) Crowds or emotional intensity impose –1 Mental while active; may skip one action per scene if overloaded.
name: Psychic Overload

desc: Viewed with suspicion by other factions; –1 Social roll in interactions with non-allied factions.
name: Cult Stigma

desc: Viewed with suspicion by other factions; –1 Social roll in interactions with non-allied factions.
name: Cult Stigma

desc: Viewed with suspicion by other factions; –1 Social roll in interactions with non-allied factions.
name: Cult Stigma

desc: Viewed with suspicion by other factions; –1 Social roll in interactions with non-allied factions.
name: Cult Stigma

desc: Obsessed with tech; –1 Perception while interacting with environment or non-tech scenarios.
name: Tech-obsession

desc: Obsessed with tech; –1 Perception while interacting with environment or non-tech scenarios.
name: Tech-obsession

desc: Obsessed with tech; –1 Perception while interacting with environment or non-tech scenarios.
name: Tech-obsession

desc: Obsessed with tech; –1 Perception while interacting with environment or non-tech scenarios.
name: Tech-obsession

desc: (Arcanist only) Withdrawal from non-magical beings; –1 Social rolls outside magical/familiar company.
name: Arcane Isolation

desc: (Psion only) Exposure to unstable minds or corrupted systems risks memory lapses; –1 Mental rolls during prolonged exposure.
name: Mental Contagion

desc: Mutable nature makes it hard for Veilborn to maintain a consistent sense of self.
name: Identity Drift

desc: Emotions and intentions unconsciously leak into surroundings.
name: Aura Bleed

desc: Sometimes phase in sleep or exhaustion, waking in strange places or drained.
name: Phantom Echo

desc: Occasionally murmur to unseen voices, unnerving others.
name: Shadowed Whispers

desc: Made a casual promise or accidental oath and are now bound to it.
name: Oath Entanglement

desc: Mythic aura attracts phenomena: signals, dream intrusions, forgotten AI routines.
name: Mythic Magnetism

desc: Heightened perception makes you vulnerable to chaotic environments.
name: Sensory Overload

desc: Long absence from spiritual places or communion with the Veil drains you.
name: Veil Sickness

desc: Conflicting genetic and mythic imprints may clash in moments of crisis.
name: Legacy Conflict

desc: May act against allies if personal gain outweighs loyalty.
name: Unstable Morality

desc: Powers demand a toll: physical deterioration, bleeding, or loss of vitality.
name: Veil’s Price

desc: “Heartbeat” is faint and irregular, tied to the Veil rather than life.
name: Hollow Pulse

desc: Appearance is unsettling. –2 to Persuasion/Social rolls.
name: Humanity’s Blight

desc: Cannot reproduce naturally. Narratively impactful.
name: Sterility Risk

desc: Animal instincts rise to the surface. –1 Mental to resist urges.
name: Savage Flow

desc: Transformation is incomplete or defective.
name: Flawed Splice

desc: Hybrid or shifted form is permanent.
name: Unshifting

desc: Unstable DNA causes degeneration. Chronic pain –1 to rolls during stress.
name: Genetic Instability

desc: Hidden programming can override or kill you.
name: Kill Switch

desc: Each shift roll 1d20. Mutation penalty/boon possible.
name: Unstable Form

desc: Feeding thrills you beyond reason. Limits control.
name: Feeding Addiction

desc: Starvation drives you toward frenzy.
name: Blood Madness

desc: Recoil at feeding on living. May abstain.
name: Shameful Hunger

desc: Seen as parasitic predators, alliances suffer suspicion.
name: Parasitic Reputation

desc: Cannot drink blood. Feed on sexual energy and lust.
name: Lustful Feeding

desc: Feeding thrills you beyond reason. Limits control.
name: Feeding Addiction

desc: Starvation drives you toward frenzy.
name: Blood Madness

desc: Recoil at feeding on living. May abstain.
name: Shameful Hunger

desc: Feeding from Supernaturals risks corruption and madness.
name: Resonance Conflict

desc: Mortal blood does not sustain you. Only supernatural Chi will.
name: Chi Hunger
